Articles.Content:
I find another hill

my hill

I find another hill

my hill
A month later StupidAndy buys a GPS navigator and stops straying and discovering the same hill again and again.
I dig a underground tunnel. It goes under the hill. The hill collapses and is now a hole. StupidAndy's hole.

I extend your hole, digging in a circle. Now there's a hill in the middle, my hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-07-12T08:30:12Z" title="07/12/2017 08:30  AM" data-short="6 yr">July 12, 2017</time> by Physics Student**

I dig into your hill and partially fill in the surrounding hole.

My rather shallow pit.
They misheard this. Your razors' hollow pit.

hello welcome to eve's heel  

well will this be evil ?

I round the heel

My hill

Eve stomps your hill with her heel.

No hill.
![Image result for quantum mechanics](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQwnUYezqQsx6h5iffKwLY59CPv2s2E6k5_R7C2agGax9eWJNKp) you get confused so its now my hill in the confusion

The universe eats your hill, and makes a new one.

My hill.
I dig up the hill and relocate it. Your misplaced large pile of dirt.
I summon the god of wind. pile of dirt blows away. nobody has a hill
I make a new hill. My hill.
Did you have a building permit? Your hill ownership is questioned.

I flatten all of you with a Tsar Bomba, and claim the land as myself.

My empty plot of land

I dig a yuge cave under your land and make a hill in the middle.

my underground hill.

Since you are invading my plot, I cover it with lead and concrete, and trap you underground.

My empty plot of land with [@spacegenius](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/166541-spacegenius/) trapped underneath.

I like my underground hill, so I make a garden with lots of flowers and apples on it. [snipped] trapping you inside and getting you to pay for it.

My underground garden hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-08-21T14:23:34Z" title="08/21/2017 02:23  PM" data-short="6 yr">August 21, 2017</time> by Deddly**
  
Political content removed

I let you keep your garden, then I mediate for days, finding true moral purpose, placing myself on a metaphorical philosophical hill.

My Metaphorical Hill.

...

My name and thread is there so my...

Thing...?
You forgot to lock the wheels of you train, so it has rolled down from the hill.

The train crashes into a hill, and I, the conductor claim it and build a large millatary base from the train parts (don't ask me how ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")).

my train fort on a hill.
